fields.name: Pure Chinon Hand Embroidered Dupatta - Shades of Punjab (68 color Bagh Dupatta)
fields.description: The 68 Color Bagh is a truly unique and exquisite piece of art, showcasing a rich tapestry of multi-colored squares meticulously hand-embroidered in 68 different hues. Crafted with precision and care, it requires nearly 2-3 months for a skilled artisan to bring this vibrant masterpiece to life. The use of pure chinon fabric adds a touch of luxury to the dupatta, enhancing its overall elegance. This one-of-a-kind dupatta not only serves as a splendid accessory for a plain Punjabi suit but also stands as a testament to the craftsmanship and cultural wealth of Punjab. The vibrant colors on the pure chinon fabric narrate the story of Punjab, reflecting its diversity and cultural vibrancy. The versatility of the 68 Color Bagh allows it to be worn with pride, transforming a simple outfit into a work of art. Alternatively, it can be used to decorate your home as a stunning wall hanging, adding a touch of Punjab's cultural heritage to your living space. The option for customization offers a personalized touch, allowing individuals to tailor the piece to their preferences. In essence, the 68 Color Bagh is not just a piece of clothing or decor; it is a celebration of Punjab's rich culture, the dedication of its artisans, and the vibrant spectrum of colors that define the region's identity.

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Dupatta - Pinky Pink
fields.description: Draped in a beautiful pink dupatta adorned with shades of sky blues, magenta, and pastel yellow, you'll radiate beauty inside and out. This piece is not just an accessory; it enhances your outer beauty, letting your inner radiance shine through. It's a touch of joy and a glow-inducing garment that adds an extra layer of happiness, making you feel completely yourself. Embrace the transformative power of this stunning dupatta and let your beauty glow from within

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Dupatta Stole - Royal Black
fields.description: Every wardrobe needs a timeless black statement piece, and this elegantly hand-embroidered Phulkari creation is a must-have that never goes out of style. Strike the perfect balance with its intricate craftsmanship, showcasing the timeless elegance of Punjab's culture and heritage. A versatile piece that speaks volumes without being too much or too little, ensuring you stand out effortlessly. Elevate your style with this enduring classic, a nod to the enduring grace and sophistication embedded in Punjab's cultural legacy.

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Dupatta - Luxury Purple
fields.description: The Pure Chanderi purple dupatta adorned with hand-embroidered Phulkari motifs is an exquisite piece that adds a touch of elegance and cultural richness to your special occasions. The deep purple hue of the Chanderi fabric, combined with the vibrant and intricately embroidered Phulkari motifs, creates a stunning visual appeal. This dupatta not only enhances your attire but also tells a captivating story of the vibrancy of Punjabi culture. The colorful Phulkari motifs symbolize the vivacity and beauty inherent in Punjabi traditions, making it a perfect representation of the region's cultural heritage. Wearing this dupatta on your special occasions will not only make you look vibrant and beautiful but also draw attention and admiration. The unique combination of the rich purple fabric and the hand-embroidered Phulkari motifs is sure to make a lasting impression. Be prepared for compliments, as everyone is likely to inquire about where you acquired this exceptional piece. The pure Chanderi purple dupatta with Phulkari motifs is not just an accessory; it's a statement of style, culture, and individuality that showcases the beauty of Punjab's traditions.

fields.name: Pure Chinon Hand Embroidered Phulkari Dupatta - Many Shades of Grey
fields.description: This mesmerizing shaded Phulkari dupatta is a cultural gem, blending elegance with rich heritage. The intricate grey tones exude sophistication and tell Punjab's story. Generously sized, it transforms any outfit into a statement piece, demanding attention. More than an accessory, it symbolizes Punjab's vibrant culture and skilled craftsmanship. Whether for special occasions or daily wear, this beautiful dupatta captivates and sparks admiration. A wearable work of art, it beautifully encapsulates the essence of Punjab

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Kurti - Black
fields.description: Elevate your joy with our Pure Chanderi Black Short Kurti, adorned in a vibrant Phulkari Hand Embroidery. Perfect for get-togethers or those mood-lifting moments, this piece is a symbol of happiness, bringing the lively spirit of Punjab to your doorstep. Embrace the color palette and radiate joy in every stitch, as this kurti transforms into a wearable expression of pure, unbridled happiness

fields.name: Pure Cotton Linen Hand Embroidered Phulkari Kurti - Aesthetic Maroon
fields.description: Indulge in comfort with our Hand Embroidered Pure Cotton Linen Kurti, crafted from the finest material with a beautifully detailed neck. This piece not only exudes artisanal charm but also tells the captivating story of Punjab's rich heritage and culture. Embrace the blend of comfort and tradition, as this kurti becomes a wearable expression of cultural opulence

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Kurti - Parakeet Green
fields.description: Introducing our Green Chanderi Kurti, a modern yet traditional masterpiece. This elegant kurti is adorned with intricate hand-embroidery on the neck, offering a perfect blend of contemporary style and classic craftsmanship. Ideal for those who appreciate the beauty of tradition with a modern twist, this kurti is a statement piece that adds sophistication to any ensemble. Elevate your style with this exquisite green kurti, where the detailing on the neck speaks volumes of enduring tradition in a fashion-forward context.

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Kurti - Daffodil Yellow
fields.description: Illuminate your wardrobe with our Gorgeous Daffodil Yellow Phulkari Kurti, a celebration of Punjab's vibrant culture in every stitch. Designed for those bright moments that light up your life, the intricate detailing on the neck, hand-embroidered with Phulkari, adds a touch of elegance. Elevate your style with this stunning yellow ensemble, where each detail captures the essence of Punjabâ€™s rich heritage, infusing a burst of color into your joyful moments.

fields.name: Pure Muslin Hand Embroidered Phulkari Kurti - Aqua Lake
fields.description: Immerse yourself in the refreshing allure of our Aqua Pure Muslin Kurti. Crafted from pure muslin fabric, this piece ensures constant comfort, making you feel rejuvenated throughout the day. Inspired by traditional Phulkari, it seamlessly blends heritage with modernity, offering an embroidery that resonates with today's generation. This Aqua-colored kurti takes you on a journey of refreshing adventures, embodying the rich heritage and cultural tapestry of Punjab.

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Suit with Dupatta - Daffodil Yellow & Teal Blue
fields.description: Complete your ensemble with our Beautiful Teal Phulkari Suit, featuring a stunning pant with hand-embroidery on the front for a unique touch. The set beautifully presents Punjab's tradition in a modern way, blending Phulkari's richness with contemporary elegance. Adding to the allure, the dupatta is printed with beautiful Phulkari motifs, infusing an extra layer of tradition and vibrancy. Elevate your style with this coordinated set, where every detail, from the intricately crafted pant to the adorned dupatta, narrates a story of tradition and modernity in perfect harmony.

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Suit with Dupatta - Parakeet Green
fields.description: Step into timeless elegance with our Parakeet Green Chanderi Suit, a stunning blend of modernity and tradition. Adorned with hand-embroidery on the neck and sleeves, this ensemble strikes a perfect balance between contemporary design and classic craftsmanship. Tailored for those who desire a traditional yet modern look, the suit captivates with its versatile appeal. The ensemble is complemented by a beautiful shaded dupatta, adding an extra layer of sophistication and completing the rich narrative of enduring tradition in a modern context. Elevate your style with this exquisite green suit, making it a standout in your wardrobe for its intricate details and timeless charm.

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Suit with Dupatta - Glacier Grey
fields.description: Elevate your formal occasions with our Beautiful Glacier Grey Chanderi Phulkari Suit. Crafted from pure chanderi, this piece exudes royalty and sophistication, making it a must-have in your wardrobe. A creation from Phulkari Forever, this suit is a blend of elegance and tradition that will undoubtedly turn heads. The stunning dupatta, adorned with intricate Phulkari embroidery, adds an ethereal touch, making the ensemble truly out of the world. Embrace the rich heritage of Punjab with this sophisticated grey suit, ensuring a regal and elegant look for your formal functions.

fields.name: Pure Linen Hand Embroidered Phulkari Kurti Pant - Sunflower Yellow
fields.description: Immerse yourself in the tranquil beauty of our Nature-Inspired Pure Linen Coord Set. The kurti, depicting a serene garden with yellow and green hues, seamlessly fuses Punjab's rich heritage with modernity. Its nature-inspired design resonates with the essence of a beautiful garden. Paired with the Pure Linen Pant, this set is a harmonious blend of comfort and style, inviting the beauty of nature into your wardrobe. Each piece tells a story, celebrating the timeless allure of Punjab's cultural opulence while encapsulating the serene charm of the natural world.

fields.name: Pure Cotton Linen Hand Embroidered Phulkari Kurti - Peach
fields.description: Envelop yourself in comfort with our Phulkari Hand Embroidered Pure Cotton Linen Kurti, meticulously crafted with intricate detailing on the neck and sleeves. The universally beloved peach color becomes a canvas, narrating the story of Punjab's rich heritage and culture. This kurti is an embodiment of luxury and tradition, seamlessly fusing comfort and style to capture the essence of Punjab's cultural richness.

fields.name: Pure Chanderi Hand Embroidered Phulkari Suit with Dupatta - Parakeet Green
fields.description: Step into timeless elegance with our Parakeet Green Chanderi Suit, a stunning blend of modernity and tradition. Adorned with hand-embroidery on the neck and sleeves, this ensemble strikes a perfect balance between contemporary design and classic craftsmanship. Tailored for those who desire a traditional yet modern look, the suit captivates with its versatile appeal. The ensemble is complemented by a beautiful shaded dupatta, adding an extra layer of sophistication and completing the rich narrative of enduring tradition in a modern context. Elevate your style with this exquisite green suit, making it a standout in your wardrobe for its intricate details and timeless charm.
